Attributes

seed

data_source

Functions

preprocess_data(examples[, max_words])

Note that many examples have the chosen=rejected in the first round of dialog, so the sample size cannot be too small.

gen_mixed_preference_data(data_source, sample_size, split)

data_source is a dict that currently supports {"harmless": p, "helpful": 1-p} format

Module Contents

src.genDPOdata.seed = 6
src.genDPOdata.preprocess_data(examples, max_words=50)

Note that many examples have the chosen=rejected in the first round of dialog, so the sample size cannot be too small.

src.genDPOdata.gen_mixed_preference_data(data_source, sample_size, split)

data_source is a dict that currently supports {“harmless”: p, “helpful”: 1-p} format split = ‘train’ or ‘test’
